title: Solving Mixture Applications
body: Marissa wants to blend candy selling for $$\$1.80$$ per pound with candy costing $$\$1.20$$ per pound to get a mixture that costs her $$\$1.40$$ per pound to make. She wants to make $$90$$ pounds of the candy blend. How
lesson: 4.3 Solve Mixture Applications with Systems of Equations
